givenName.description: The given name (first name) of the person.

familyName.description: The family name (last name) of the person.

position.description: The position or job title of the person in the organization.

phone.description: The telephone number of the person.

email.description: The email address of the person.

description.description: A short description of the person.

type.description: The type of person (e.g., employee or external author).

socialMedia.description: The list of social media profiles of the person.

type.description: The type of social media platform (e.g., GitHub, LinkedIn).

url.description: The URL of the social media profile.

image.description: Relative path to the image that represents the person.

imageAlt.description: The alt text for the person's image. Defaults to the person's name.

photographerName.description: The name of the photographer who took the person's image, if applicable.
